text: Doutzen Kroes'three - year - old daughter Myllena Mae was'fascinated'by her pregnant pal Candice Swanepoel's'growing belly'while vacationing on a Brazilian beach in Bahia on Tuesday. The 29 - year - old IMG Model - who boasts 13. 2M social media followers - called it a'special moment'while clad in a grey underwire bikini from her upcoming swimwear collection, TropicofC.'Myllena is amazed by the fact that there is a baby growing in Candice her belly,'the 32 - year - old Dutch model explained on Instagram.
